errore400Desc: The request syntax is incorrect. Check the formatting of your request
errore401Desc: You must authenticate to access this resource
errore402Desc: Access to the resource requires payment
errore403Desc: You do not have the necessary permissions to access this resource
errore404Desc: The requested resource was not found on the server
errore405Desc: The HTTP method used is not allowed for the requested resource
errore406Desc: The server cannot generate a response compatible with the criteria of the request
errore407Desc: You must authenticate with the proxy to proceed
errore408Desc: The server took too long to respond. Please try again
errore409Desc: The request cannot be completed due to a conflict
errore410Desc: The requested resource is no longer available and there are no forwarding addresses
errore411Desc: The server refuses the request because the content length is not specified
errore412Desc: One or more conditions in the request header were not met
errore413Desc: The size of the request is larger than what the server is willing to process
errore414Desc: The requested URI is too long for the server to process
errore416Desc: The client has asked for a portion of the file, but the server cannot supply that portion
errore417Desc: The server cannot meet the requirements of the Expect request-field header
errore421Desc: The request was directed to a server that is not able to produce a response
errore422Desc: The request is well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors
errore423Desc: The resource you are trying to access is locked
errore424Desc: The request fails due to the failure of a previous request
errore425Desc: Indicates that the server is unwilling to risk processing a request that might be replayed
errore426Desc: The client should switch to a different protocol such as TLS/1.0
errore428Desc: The server requires the request from the client to be conditional
errore429Desc: You have sent too many requests in a given period of time
errore431Desc: The server is unable to process the request because one or more fields in the request header are too large
errore451Desc: Access to the resource is blocked for legal reasons
errore500Desc: The server encountered an internal error and cannot complete your request
errore501Desc: The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request
errore502Desc: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server
errore503Desc: The server is currently unavailable, usually due to overload or maintenance
errore504Desc: The server was acting as a gateway or proxy and did not receive a response in time
errore505Desc: The HTTP protocol version used in the request is not supported by the server
errore506Desc: The variant of the content negotiation requested is not configured
errore507Desc: The server is unable to store the representation needed to complete the request
errore508Desc: The server detected an infinite loop while processing the request
errore511Desc: Authentication is required to access the network
